column2:
"I gathered the required data,
and with it, I should be able to do some real analysis."

"Hm? Why am I doing this
and not the Dragonkin investigation?"

"The Dragonkin are certainly
fascinating, but we can't neglect
something that could destroy them."

"It's not exactly two birds with one stone, but this is also an important
survey for my research."

"So, that's it, <%me>.
If something comes up, please think of me."
